full_summary:
================================
### Solicitation of Offers: Rubber Floor Tile and Adhesive

**Contract Reference Number:** WS4132763336-Doc4227895466
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Publication Date:** September 27, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** October 6, 2023, 14:00 (EDT)

### Announcement Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a solicitation of offers for the supply and delivery of Rubber Floor Tile and Adhesive as per the requirements specified below.

### Item Description

* UNSPSC Classification: 30161705 (Rubber flooring), 30161707 (Vinyl flooring), 30161720 (Floor panel)

### Procurement Details

* Procurement Category: Government of Canada
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

### Contract Details

* Regions of Delivery: Ontario (except NCR)
* Regions of Opportunity: None
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None

### End User Information

* End User Entity: Correctional Service of Canada (CSC)
* End User Entity Address: 340 Laurier Ave W, Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 0P9, Canada

### Contact Information

* Contact Person: Chui, Stanley (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contact Email: [stanley.chui@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:stanley.chui@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Contact Phone Number: None
* Contact Fax Number: None

### Additional Info

* Notice URL: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17566791?extsite=MTc1NjY3OTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17566791?extsite=MTc1NjY3OTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* Attachment: None

Note: Please refer to the attached documents for more detailed information regarding the solicitation of offers.
